channel.title: Are runescape hacks for real?
channel.description:
HEy i was wondering if the thang were u type ur credit card number on websites and they give u like 1m for $4 also i wanted to know if there were real runescape hacks?
ps. hope i dont get banned for this im only asking a question right?+ i just got the mopar forum account 5.35 minutes ago! add ikilleeu2 to rs friends list..... yeah its a lame naem i know :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :) :) :) ;) ;) ;) :D :D :mad: :mad: :mad: :( :( :( :eek: :eek: :cool: :cool: :cool: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :P :P :o :o :o :confused: :confused: :confused: :| :| ;D ;D ;D im really :cool:

item.title: Are runescape hacks for real?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Martin, post:7, topic:107556”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=153964.msg1453078#msg1453078 date=1181356649]

It is impossible to hack runescape. Don’t try and be a smartass and prove me wrong, it just simply won’t happen.

Nothing’s impossible ;). lol

Anyway’s as far as I know there are no runescape hacks as of right now, and I’m pretty sure that anyone with enough skill to hack them would spend there time more wisely doing something like robbing an eBank or paypal…

Sure, the odd bug slips through here and there but I would think there are extreme measures in place to prevent duping and such.
[/quote]

You would be surprised… Think about the glory dupe… They was only caught because they were jagex noticed that there was like 20k glories for sale in the forums[/quote]

I never saw that, however, I call bluff on ALL dupes.

Jagex hires security administrators for their fucking servers, you’d think they would learn there lesson and implement a system to log how many items a user gets per minute, and the next minute, compare and discard if useless. I mean, that would be simple to do.

Read full topic

Anyway’s as far as I know there are no runescape hacks as of right now, and I’m pretty sure that anyone with enough skill to hack them would spend there time more wisely doing something like robbing an eBank or paypal…
[/quote]

Sure, the odd bug slips through here and there but I would think there are extreme measures in place to prevent duping and such.[/quote]

You would be surprised… Think about the glory dupe… They was only caught because they were jagex noticed that there was like 20k glories for sale in the forums

item.title: Are runescape hacks for real?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

If they’re trying to sell you RS cash, it may possibly be legit (though I would have doubts)…but if they’re advertising RS hacks, then its most definitely a scam
